namePrompt.speaker: Loki
namePrompt.text: So… tell me again. What name do you want this land to remember?

questions.speaker: Loki
questions.text: Dreadheim gives gifts that bite. A warm hall offers you food and a seat—no price mentioned.

questions.speaker: Loki
questions.text: You hear your name whispered from the Frostwood—soft, familiar, wrong.

questions.speaker: Loki
questions.text: A traveler begs to walk beside you through the dark.

good.label: Allow it, but set clear rules

questions.speaker: Loki
questions.text: You find a charm in the snow—beautiful, shining, untouched by frost.

good.label: Leave it. Nothing free is clean here

evil.label: Take it. If it’s cursed, you’ll use it anyway

questions.speaker: Loki
questions.text: A gate of iron stands behind you. It does not lock. It judges.

evil.label: Test it hard. If it breaks, it was weak

tiebreaker.speaker: Loki
tiebreaker.text: Final question—be honest, just this once. What do you want most?

truth.speaker: Loki
truth.text: {name}… how charming. You want truth. Dreadheim will give it to you in pieces.

power.speaker: Loki
power.text: {name}… ah. You want power. Dreadheim loves that—because it always collects interest.
